00017 from wx import ToolBar, Bitmap
00018 import os
00019 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
00020 
00021 class toolbar(ToolBar):
00022     def __init__(self, master, resources, orientation): # resources (file, icons)
00023         ToolBar.__init__(self, master, style=orientation)
00024         self.master = master
00025 
00026         self.__XMLfile   = resources[0]
00027         self.__iconspath = resources[1]
00028 
00029         self.buttonsList = []
00030         self.widgetsList = []
00031 
00032         self.__createToolbar()
00033         self.Realize()
00034 
00035     def __createToolbar(self):
00036         tree = ET.parse(self.__XMLfile)
00037         root = tree.getroot()                                   
00038         
00039         for i in root:
00040             if i.attrib['name'] == 'Separator':
00041                 self.buttonsList.append('Separator')
00042                 self.AddSeparator()
00043             else:    
00044                 self.buttonsList.append([i.attrib['name'], i.attrib['icon']])
00045                 self.widgetsList.append([i.attrib['name'], 
00046                                          self.AddLabelTool(-1, '', Bitmap(os.path.join(self.__iconspath, i.attrib['icon'])))])
00047 
00048 if __name__ == "__main__": # test - to be deleted after adding callbacks!
00049     import wx
00050     app = wx.App(False)
00051     x = wx.Frame(None)   
00052     vbox = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00053     
00054     m = toolbar(x, ("../../etc/gui/lefttoolbar.xml", "../../resources/icons22x22/lefttoolbar"), wx.TB_VERTICAL)
00055     
00056     vbox.Add(m, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00057     x.SetSizer(vbox)
00058     
00059     x.SetSize((800, 600))
00060     x.SetTitle('Test icons and shortcuts')
00061     x.Centre()
00062     x.Show(True)    
00063     app.MainLoop()
